title: CMMStudy
description: This schema defines the format of the CMMStudy record type.

studyNumber.description: A studyNumber that uniquely identifies the CMMStudy within a repository.

^[a-z]{2}$.description: A CMMStudy abstract for the given language code.

abstract.description: An object containing an abstract in various languages. Uses language code properties and abstract values. E.g. {'en': 'An abstract', 'no': 'Et sammendrag'}

classifications.description: Topics(classifications) for this CMMStudy in potentially multiple languages.

^[a-z]{2}$.description: An array of Keywords for this CMMStudy in this Given iso Language code

keywords.description: Keywords for this CMMStudy in potentially multiple languages.

^[a-z]{2}$.description: An array of timeDimensions for this CMMStudy in this Given iso Language code.

typeOfTimeMethods.description: Time Methods for this CMMStudy in potentially multiple languages.

^[a-z]{2}$.description: An array of Countries for this CMMStudy in this Given iso Language code.

studyAreaCountries.description: Countries for this CMMStudy in potentially multiple languages.

^[a-z]{2}$.description: An array of Analysis Units for this CMMStudy in this Given iso Language code.

unitTypes.description: Analysis Units for this CMMStudy in potentially multiple languages.

^[a-z]{2}$.description: A CMMStudy studyTitle for the given language code.

titleStudy.description: An object containing Study Titles in various languages. Uses language code properties and abstract values. E.g. {'en': 'An studyTitle', 'no': 'Et studyTitle'}.

^[a-z]{2}$.description: A CMMStudy institution publishing the research data for the given language code.

publisher.description: An object containing Study Titles in various languages. Uses language code properties and abstract values. E.g. {'en': 'An studyTitle', 'no': 'Et studyTitle'}.

publicationYear.description: Year of publication (by publisher) of the study (for citation) - [YYYY] or the whole [YYYY-MM-DD].

^[a-z]{2}$.description: An array of Persistent Identifiers for this CMMStudy in this Given iso Language code.

pidStudies.description: Persistent Identifiers for this CMMStudy in potentially multiple languages.

associatedInstitutions.description: An array of Associated Institutions for this CMMStudy.

fileLanguages.description: An array of File Languages (standardised ISO) for this CMMStudy.

classIdentifier.description: Unique identifier of class/category within the classification system.

items.description: Type of sampling procedure used for data collection. Controlled vocabulary Includes a typology of sampling methods.

typeOfSamplingProcedures.description: An array of sampling procedures used for data collection.

^[a-z]{2}$.description: Freetext description of the type of sampling procedure used for data collection.

samplingProcedure.description: An object containing Freetext description of the type of sampling procedure used for data collection. E.g. {'en': 'An sampling procedure a', 'no': 'Et sampling procedure a'}.

items.description: Description of the method of data collection - the procedure, technique, or mode of inquiry used to attain the data.

typeOfModeOfCollections.description: An array of description of the methods of data collection.

dataCollectionPeriodStartdate.description: A JSON date string in ISO 8601 format, e.g. 2012-04-23T18:25:43.511Z.

dataCollectionPeriodEnddate.description: A JSON date string in ISO 8601 format, e.g. 2012-04-23T18:25:43.511Z.

^[a-z]{2}$.description: Freetext description of possibilities to access data.

dataAccess.description: An object containing Freetext description of possibilities to access data. E.g. {'en': 'via web', 'no': 'Et via web'}.

accessClass.description: Class of availability of the research data.

^[a-z]{2}$.description: Reference to a creator alongside her/his affiliation eg "Ami Doe(University of DV)".

creators.description: An object containing creators in various languages. Uses language code properties and abstract values. E.g. {'en': 'Ami Doe(University of DV)', 'no': 'Ami Doe(ET University of DV)'}

lastModified.description: A JSON date string in ISO 8601 format, e.g. 2012-04-23T18:25:43.511Z.

isActive.description: Is the record marked as deleted. If record is deleted this = false.
